text: Parantu tyanni dusaryanda du'a (prarthana) keli ki he amacya palanakartya! Amace pravasa dura duraparyanta kara ani jya'arthi tyanni svatah apalya hatanni apale va'ita karuna ghetale, yastava amhi tyanna (jun'ya) kahanicya rupata karuna takale2 ani tyance tukade tukade karuna takaleta3 nihsansaya, pratyeka sahanasila ani krtajnasila manasakarita ya (ghatane) ta aneka nisanya aheta
